column1: I am still in love with you
I want to see you soon
I want to have sex with you
I can't stand a day without you
I want to see you now
I hate you and never want to see you again
I fucking hate you and never want to see your face again
I feel like my life is not worth living without you
I am so scared and alone without you
It was never going to work out between us in the first place
You digust me to my very core after what you did
I promise I will change please take me back
You forgot your shirt at my place
I just wanted to know how you are doing
I just took my dog for a walk
I just walked to the park
I drove the kids to the school
I went to the swimming pool yesterday
I ran into your friend Jessica at the gym yesterday
Your brother phoned me at work last week
You forgot to send me the money for the last rent
How did you do in the exam
I saw your friend in the gym yesterday
Do you want your shirt back
I hope you are doing okay
